findings.message: The document enforces Option B "no auto-execution" as a hard constraint, but later models downstream behavior as auto-executed (`/lp-do-fact-find` receives auto-executed dispatches at line 159). This is a policy-logic contradiction that can produce invalid planning decisions against the active trial contract.
Frontmatter says "Existing queue entries are corrected," but non-goals explicitly exclude retroactive rewrite of existing entries (line 63). Scope is internally inconsistent.
`area_anchor` is specified as `<=12 words`, but risk mitigation later says `<=15 words` (line 312), and acceptance checks revert to `<=12` (line 352). This creates ambiguous acceptance criteria.

The claim that no `operator_idea` path exists in TS is overstated; TS currently contains `operator_idea`-aware types/consumers (e.g., dispatch/classifier compatibility), even if intake authoring is skill-driven.
